resources.string: The unicycle have 3 ride modes. Each mode sets a different value of acceleration when you lean forward/backward. On Soft mode the unicycle will take more time to get up to maximum speed when compared to Madden mode.

The unicycle should be calibrated to balance and keep on the upright position.
 To make the calibration, please execute the following steps:
 - Click on the button Calibrate (the unicycle will start beeping)
 - Turn off the power button
 - Place the unicycle in the upright position
 - Turn on the power button (if everything went correctly the unicycle will beep)
 - Turn off the power button
You can choose and configure one of the three parameters to get an alert (while the app is running). The alert will make your smartphone vibrate.
